hasDefinedTerm.name: Optizen
hasDefinedTerm.description: A comprehensive Shopify optimization application designed to enhance store performance and user experience

hasDefinedTerm.name: Version 3 Upgrade
hasDefinedTerm.description: Major framework update improving performance, security, and preparing for new features

hasDefinedTerm.name: Framework Upgrade
hasDefinedTerm.description: Complete overhaul of the underlying application architecture for better performance and extensibility

acceptedAnswer.text: Optizen is a comprehensive Shopify optimization app designed to enhance store performance, user experience, and conversion rates for e-commerce merchants.
Version 3 includes a complete framework upgrade with improved performance and security. While no new features are included in this release, it prepares the foundation for exciting upcoming features.

Optizen receives regular updates to improve performance, add new features, and maintain compatibility with the latest Shopify developments. Major version updates occur periodically to introduce significant enhancements.

mainEntity.name: Will the Version 3 upgrade affect my current settings?

acceptedAnswer.text: The Version 3 upgrade is primarily a backend framework improvement focused on performance and security. Your existing settings and configurations should remain intact during the upgrade process.
